Description: Fragment of flattened handle from a Knidian pottery transport amphora. Clay medium pink-brown; mixed inclusions. Rectangular stamp at top of handle with Greek inscription and trident symbol.
Type series: KT720 (Virginia Grace's unpublished K(nidian) T(ype) series)
Curator's comments: Names Epinikidas and Theudamos. Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p. 175, 12
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0293)
